# sportity

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of sportity is to make HTTP requests to Sportity easier.

## Installation

You can install the development version of sportity from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("loprtq/sportity")
```
